content:
IG publisher question. The default structure definition template has the following:

<p>This structure is derived from <a href="{{site.data.structuredefinitions[page.id].basepath}}">{{site.data.structuredefinitions[page.id].basename}}</a> </p>

Unfortunately, the link generated is the official URL for the structure definition, not the actual one from the current build. For example:

http://hl7.org/fhir/ccda/StructureDefinition/CCDA-on-FHIR-US-Realm-Header

instead of

http://hl7.org/fhir/current/ccda/StructureDefinition-ccda-us-realm-header-composition.html

Is there any way to get Jekyll to output the correct URL in the link?
@Rick Geimer - I've fixed this. Sent you an email.
